name: Fire Support
description:
A small artillery team at your command is all that stands between an overwhelming enemy force and your forces. Prevent as many enemies from reaching them as possible for as long as you can. 

Controls:

Left mouse button: Fire artillery shells. (Hold and drag for a wider spread)

Escape: Exit the game.

Made for:

CFNGamejam#2

Special thanks to the DSR squad,  and everyone that supports my games.  🐺
